The tweet by Rudy Giuliani about the U: S. giving $3.7 million to a Wuhan lab in 2017 was real and the Wuhan Institute of Virology did receive NIH research grants.
The: 3.7 million comprised a series of multiple grants for coronavirus research issued by the U.S. National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases over several years to different entities, with the Wuhan Institute of Virology being one of them.
